titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Elizabeth E. Hoyt Composition Book 1838-1843
titlestmt.subtitle: Hoyt, Elizabeth E. Composition Book Mss. Acc. 2009.585

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created by Ute Schechter, 2009

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Elizabeth E. Hoyt Composition Book, 1838-1843 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center Mss. Acc. 2009.585
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2012 &contact;
Processed By
Special Collections Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Composition book of Elizabeth Hoyt of Hell Gate, N.Y. Her essays cover a variety of topics and date from 1838-1843. A number of pages from the middle of the volume have been cut out.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Elizabeth E. Hoyt Composition Book, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 12/10/2009.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Seller bought this volume from the estate of Colgate Dorr, some of whose papers are cataloged under Mss. Acc. 2009.586, Colgate Dorr Papers. The Hoyt and Dorr families intermarried in the early part of the 19th century.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and minimally processed in December 2009 by Ute Schechter, Warren E. Burger Archivist.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki:http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Elizabeth_E._Hoyt

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Composition book of Elizabeth Hoyt of Hell Gate, N.Y. Her essays cover a variety of topics and date from 1838-1843. A number of pages from the middle of the volume have been cut out.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Mss. Acc. 2009.586, Colgate Dorr Papers, 1912-1944.The Hoyt and Dorr families intermarried in the early part of the 19th century and both sets of papers were acquired from the estate of Colgate Dorr.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
